lead_paragraph: Pope Francis urged leaders to work together to fight the "plague of terrorism", saying in his New Year's address on Sunday that a bloodstain was covering the world as it started 2017.
snippet: Pope Francis urged leaders to work together to fight the "plague of terrorism", saying in his New Year's address on Sunday that a bloodstain was covering the world as it started 2017....

headline.main: Pope Says Terrorism Casts Bloodstain Over World, Condemns Istanbul Attack
headline.print_headline: Pope Says Terrorism Casts Bloodstain Over World, Condemns Istanbul Attack
